Objectives

To constantly expand my knowledge of tools and technologies in order to become more efficient and broaden my perspective of my field.
To follow good and established practices relative to the tool, language or task at hand.
To introduce clients to new concepts and design ideas to make something that is both practical and innovative.
To eventually contribute back to the open source community.
To continue to have fun with programming.
